control_attributes.control_description: The organization obtains maintenance support and/or spare parts for [Assignment: organization-defined information system components] within [Assignment: organization-defined time period] of failure.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization disables accounts of users posing a significant risk within [Assignment: organization-defined time period] of discovery of the risk.
